name: DeployCrmSolutionTask
description: Deploy Dynamics 365 Solution managed or unmanaged using async import operation.
author: capgemini-uk

inputs.name: solutionName
inputs.label: Solution Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Dynamics 365 Solution to deploy.

inputs.name: solutionPath
inputs.label: Solution Filepath
inputs.helpMarkDown: The filepath to the Dynamics 365 Solution to be imported.

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: ConnectionString to Dynamics 365 instance. [Microsoft Connection String Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect#create-a-connection-string)

inputs.name: overwriteUnmanagedCust
inputs.label: Overwrite Unmanaged Customisations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag that determines whether the 'Overwrite Unmanaged Customisations' will be set during import.

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: Release Artifact Build Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The build number for the artefact that contains the solution.

inputs.name: forceUpdate
inputs.label: Force Update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag that determines whether the Update should be forced. If ticked, the deployment will be forced through even if the version number has not changed.

inputs.name: stepForUpgrade
inputs.label: Use Stage for Upgrade
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag that determines whether 'Stage for Upgrade' will be used to import.

inputs.name: publishChanges
inputs.label: Publish Changes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag that determins whether the changes will be published after the import is completed.

inputs.name: activateWorkflows
inputs.label: Activate Workflows
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag that determines whether all workflows in the solution should be activated after the import is completed.
